column2:
"Wow... this place is cool!
It's so spacious! Look at all the bright lights
that are flickering!"

"And, it's also kinda...
comfy in its own way.
I really like this place!"

"Even the people I didn't say anything to.
Somehow I know they're all
caring people."

"I asked big sis if she was okay,
and she said she was."

"But somehow she doesn't seem her
usual self."

"I tried to think about how I could cheer her up,
but I couldn't think of anything.
I wonder what I should do..."

"Big sis's big brother is alive.
That's something to be happy about, right?"

"People should smile during happy times like this.
I hope everyone smiles some more."

"Big sis will be okay.
I just know she will."

"But I want to help her somehow.
I feel so... helpless."

"I really want to help her soon.
So I'll do anything!"

"マザーは助けられなかったけど……
ぼくの中に、生きているはずだから
ぼくがしっかり、生きないと。"

"そうじゃないと、ぼくを助けるために
がんばってくれた、お姉ちゃんや
みんなに、もうしわけないもの。"

"……だから、ぼくは笑うよ。
みんな、助けてくれてありがとうって。"

"世界をむりやり作り替えるなんて
誰も望んでないはずだよ。"

"マザーの力をそんなことに
使わせたくない。
絶対に、止めないと……。"
